thread.title: Little Mix BRITs performance annihilated by viewers: 'Like four drunk girls doing karaoke'
thread.title_full: Little Mix BRITs performance annihilated by viewers: 'Like four drunk girls doing karaoke'

title: Little Mix BRITs performance annihilated by viewers: 'Like four drunk girls doing karaoke'
text:
HARSH CRITICISM: Some viewers put the girls' performance on blast 
One scathing remark read: "They should've added the shouting in the actual single." 
Another viewer claimed they couldn't understand what Little Mix were singing. 
"Genuinely sounds like Little Mix are shouting to their eggs," they quipped. 
A little harsh, no? 
But it wasnâ€™t all doom and gloom as Perrie, Leigh-Anne, Jesy and Jade also had plenty of fan support. The BRIT Awards 2017: Fashion Fails Wednesday, 22nd February 2017 Take a look at the fashion fails from the 2017 BRIT Awards 1 / 14 
Getty SLAY OR NAY? Little Mix caused a stir 
One admirer said: "Did Little Mix just slay the BRITS or did they just slay the BRITs?" 
Echoing the praise, another delighted fan simply tweeted: "Amazing," followed by several heart-eyed emojis. 
Little Mix made a dramatic entrance to the stage as they as they were carried in on the shoulders of dancers. 
Dressed in revealing, what we can only describe as, sexy space suits, the girls dared to bare as they danced around the stage. 
Love 'em or hate 'em, you can't deny Little Mix know how to get the crowd moving. Related Articles
